00021 #define DEBUG_OUT(token)    FUDebug::DebugOut(FU_LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __LINE__, token);

00038 #define ERROR_OUT2(token, arg1, arg2)       FUDebug::DebugOut(FU_LOG_ERROR, __FILE__, __LINE__, token, arg1, arg2);
